sentences.sContent: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.sCn: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.sContent: the needs of the individual customer
...The video challenge does not put individual students on the hot seat—so it’s less intimidating by design...
...social norms and individual behaviors all play a part to put technology in its place...
...robot follows Asimov's zero law: robots cannot harm humanity as opposed to individual humans or allow humanity to come to harm...
...the number of individual working hours is reduced in an effort to avoid layoffs...
...The exact type of stimulation that an individual uses is not as important as being intellectually engaged...
...$8000 for an individual or $21000 for a family...
...on both the individual and population level...
...the true power of online reviews lies not just in the individual stories...
...Fifth graders tended to focus on features of individual eagles...

phrases.pCn: 个人价值，个体价值；个别值

remMethod.val: in(不) ＋ divid(看作divide， 分， 划分) ＋ ual → 不可再分的 → 个体

利己主义者，个人主义者

trans.tranOther: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in
